titleStmt.title: An exposicion vpon the songe of the blessed virgine Mary, called Magnificat Where vnto are added the songes of Salue regina, Benedictus and Nu[n]c dimittis. Translated out of latine into Englysh by Ihon Hollybush.
titleStmt.author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546.

titleStmt.title: An exposicion vpon the songe of the blessed virgine Mary, called Magnificat Where vnto are added the songes of Salue regina, Benedictus and Nu[n]c dimittis. Translated out of latine into Englysh by Ihon Hollybush.
titleStmt.author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546.
Coverdale, Miles, 1488-1568.

notesStmt.note: Jhon Hollybush is a pseudonym for Miles Coverdale.
Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Identified as STC 17536 on UMI microfilm reels 17 and 121.
Appears at reels 17 and 121 (both British Library copy).
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
